snippet.title: Battle Princess Madelyn Arcade Mode
snippet.description:
Arcade mode is a showcase of the game's story mode's levels with a faster paced game play, completely different level structure and style of play for a more difficult. A true homage to games of yesteryear, a real old school experience.

** Info & Links **

Battle Princess Madelyn, coming to Nintendo Switch, PC, Xbox One, PS4, PS Vita and WiiU is developed by Causal Bit Games and co-published by Hound Picked Games. 

Learn more about Battle Princes Madelyn: https://houndpicked.com/battle-princess-madelyn/
Join the developers on Discord: https://discord.gg/HoundPicked
